DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess ability darbepoetin alfa maintain hemoglobin concentration great equal 10 g/dL administer every 3 week ( Q3W ) .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Anemic Subjects With Non-Myeloid Malignancies Receiving Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Subjects nonmyeloid malignancy Anemia ( screen hemoglobin concentration great equal 10.5 g/dL less equal 12.0 g/dL ) relate cancer chemotherapy At least 8 additional week cyclic chemotherapy plan regardless schedule Karnofsky Performance Status great equal 50 % Serum creatinine concentration less equal 2.0 mg/dL Exclusion Criteria : Iron deficiency Red blood cell ( RBC ) transfusion within 4 week screen Unstable cardiac disease
